snippet: Sen. Mike Lee compares the president's recess appointments to Pearl Harbor.
abstract: Sen. Mike Lee compares the president's recess appointments to Pearl Harbor.
lead_paragraph: Sen. Mike Lee, the Utah Republican, tweeted the following yesterday afternoon: "Jan. 4, 2012, may well be a day that will live on in infamy, as a day the Congress ceded one of its rightful powers to the executive."

headline.main: A Date Which Will Live in Infamy
